description: Core Failure Thresholds Manifest (CFTM). Defines immutable mathematical constants for Governance Axiom (GAX) validation models.

COF_Stability_Model.rationale: Used in the Certification of Failure (COF) denominator to ensure computational stability (prevent division by zero) when observed Risk (S-02) is negligible.

P01_Finality_Model.rationale: The mandatory percentage by which measured Efficacy (S-01) must exceed adjusted Risk (S-02). Failure to maintain this safety margin halts P-01 Finality Certification.
